description: two green vertical irregular geometric shapes in foreground covering radiating rectangles of various widths and colors, with greys and black near outer edges and bright colors (predominately red, blue and orange) at center; grey "frame" at edges of rectangles--covered by green forms; raised lines on green forms extend black and grey rectangles; shadows create perspective--green forms appear in front of rectangles; no frame
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back on board, in  on back on board, in pencil: [RN / 13]
medium: Acrylic on canvas mounted on board
title: Severed Hue (Green)
